post.body: http://twitpic.com/t7ui - Congrats on finding phone!!! How cool that you posted the recording sheet?!!! may logistics be smo ...
...i need to get out more. watched a couple of episodes of 'lost' and Really connected.LOL. need to get out more....brilliant day to all!!
derek. two words that say Everything about my music...acappellelectronica discomindfunk...of course, i had to make the words up...lol..s
hope everyone's weekend has flow..if not. argh4u!!! know i wish it weren't so. may light glow on you from unexpected places...stef
did a deviant art profile4visual art.the users ROCK in there!!that site is ALIVE. check out my page: http://obscurerelevance.deviantart.com/
wow.shredding session...changing 'RuReady2Dance' to GetTHEfUPnDANCE.. i don't know if it's good. and. i like it. so i guess that's that...
wading thru messages. lol. coming up with great ideas. like making more profiles!!...it's like a giant MIME peanut and butter sandwich...
good morning!!! i think you are all AWESOME. thank you. stef
about to jump over to music brain..feeling this odd relief about the internet. twitter. myspace. facebook. all in their own place. me. here.
wading through msgs on myspace...thinking of making music in a while...
sleep should be optional....just woke up from a late night studio session...i feel like a frog in a fuzzy sweater...good morning
on the networking...onto the studio in a few...Big Smile At You!!! stef
sleep...peaceful smile at you...may your sunday be a more than funday. stef
back in the studio recording...wishing everyone the brightest weekend!
...ok. answered as many msgs as my fingers will allow. worked on my profile. myspace.com/sdb2005 .getting back into the fibers. see you soon
feeling gratitude 4 the people following me..Thank You for caring! if u ever need help with anything just ask.if i can.i will. mayURlifeHugU
...here.msging while i let my eardrums return2their normal shape..Derek said mailing list. whatamigonna do? buiding that mailing list...lol
...awake and going through messages from my space. I was locked out for months....funny how the world feels just as large with technology...
ok.sleep. fine.lol. How can any1 sleep at a time like this? There is still room on the harddrive?!!..I am off to a cuba libre...thn bck2msgs
....thank you. I hope everyone is in calm space....
